name: TrackedControllerFix
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Allows your controllers to track while the SteamVR overlay is open. This also fixes Quest/Touch controllers feeling slow during fast movements.

Support for SmoothRay & DesktopVRSwitch.
**Only supports OpenVR, not OpenXR.**
changelog:
- Fixes for 2023r171.
- Prevented from initializing when launching with OpenXR.
